tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE satellite_communications (
    frequency_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id UUID,
    band_name VARCHAR(50),
    bandwidth_allocation INT
)

CREATE TABLE bandwidth_allocation (
    allocation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id INT,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    allocated_bandwidth FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE bandwidth_allocations ( 
    allocation_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    band_id INT, 
    satellite_id INT, 
    allocation_start DATETIME, 
    allocation_end DATETIME 
);

CREATE TABLE satellite_communications (
    satellite_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_name STRING,
    frequency_band STRING,
    bandwidth_allocation INT
)

CREATE TABLE frequency_bands (
    band_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    band_name STRING,
    band_range STRING
)

CREATE TABLE bandwidth_allocations (
    allocation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id UUID,
    band_id UUID,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username STRING,
    email STRING
)

CREATE TABLE Satellites (
    satellite_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_name VARCHAR(255),
    launch_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Communication (
    communication_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    satellite_id UUID,
    frequency FLOAT,
    bandwidth FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE BandwidthAllocations (
    allocation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    communication_id UUID,
    start_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    end_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE GroundStations (
    station_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    station_name VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE FrequencyRanges (
    range_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    min_frequency FLOAT,
    max_frequency FLOAT
)
